price: Nokorε sε, amanebͻ (ahodoͻ) a εkͻ asomu wͻ (saa Qur’aan) yi mu de ma nnipa a wͻsom (Nyame).
arabic: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna fī hādhā labalāghan liqawmin ʿābidīna
